00017 #include <stdint.h>
00018 #include <stdio.h>
00019 #include <string.h>
00020 
00021 #define ROTL(x,b) (uint64_t)(((x) << (b)) | ((x) >> (64 - (b))))
00022 
00023 #define U32TO8_LE(p, v)         \
00024 (p)[0] = (uint8_t)((v)      ); (p)[1] = (uint8_t)((v) >>  8); \
00025 (p)[2] = (uint8_t)((v) >> 16); (p)[3] = (uint8_t)((v) >> 24);
00026 
00027 #define U64TO8_LE(p, v)         \
00028 U32TO8_LE((p),     (uint32_t)((v)     ));   \
00029 U32TO8_LE((p) + 4, (uint32_t)((v) >> 32));
00030 
00031 #define U8TO64_LE(p) \
00032 (((uint64_t)((p)[0])      ) | \
00033 ((uint64_t)((p)[1]) <<  8) | \
00034 ((uint64_t)((p)[2]) << 16) | \
00035 ((uint64_t)((p)[3]) << 24) | \
00036 ((uint64_t)((p)[4]) << 32) | \
00037 ((uint64_t)((p)[5]) << 40) | \
00038 ((uint64_t)((p)[6]) << 48) | \
00039 ((uint64_t)((p)[7]) << 56))
00040 
00041 #define SIPROUND            \
00042 do {              \
00043 v0 += v1; v1=ROTL(v1,13); v1 ^= v0; v0=ROTL(v0,32); \
00044 v2 += v3; v3=ROTL(v3,16); v3 ^= v2;     \
00045 v0 += v3; v3=ROTL(v3,21); v3 ^= v0;     \
00046 v2 += v1; v1=ROTL(v1,17); v1 ^= v2; v2=ROTL(v2,32); \
00047 } while(0)
00048 
00049 /* SipHash-2-4 */
00050 uint64_t
00051 siphash_2_4(const unsigned char *in, size_t inlen, const unsigned char *k)
00052 {
00053     /* "somepseudorandomlygeneratedbytes" */
00054     uint64_t v0 = 0x736f6d6570736575ULL;
00055     uint64_t v1 = 0x646f72616e646f6dULL;
00056     uint64_t v2 = 0x6c7967656e657261ULL;
00057     uint64_t v3 = 0x7465646279746573ULL;
00058     uint64_t b;
00059     uint64_t k0 = U8TO64_LE(k);
00060     uint64_t k1 = U8TO64_LE(k + 8);
00061     uint64_t m;
00062     const uint8_t *end = in + inlen - (inlen % sizeof(uint64_t));
00063     const int left = inlen & 7;
00064     b = ((uint64_t)inlen) << 56;
00065     v3 ^= k1;
00066     v2 ^= k0;
00067     v1 ^= k1;
00068     v0 ^= k0;
00069     
00070     for (; in != end; in += 8) {
00071         m = U8TO64_LE(in);
00072 #ifdef DEBUG
00073         printf("(%3d) v0 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v0 >> 32), (uint32_t)v0);
00074         printf("(%3d) v1 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v1 >> 32), (uint32_t)v1);
00075         printf("(%3d) v2 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v2 >> 32), (uint32_t)v2);
00076         printf("(%3d) v3 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v3 >> 32), (uint32_t)v3);
00077         printf("(%3d) compress %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(m >> 32), (uint32_t)m);
00078 #endif
00079         v3 ^= m;
00080         SIPROUND;
00081         SIPROUND;
00082         v0 ^= m;
00083     }
00084     
00085     switch (left) {
00086         case 7: b |= ((uint64_t)in[6])  << 48;
00087             
00088         case 6: b |= ((uint64_t)in[5])  << 40;
00089             
00090         case 5: b |= ((uint64_t)in[4])  << 32;
00091             
00092         case 4: b |= ((uint64_t)in[3])  << 24;
00093             
00094         case 3: b |= ((uint64_t)in[2])  << 16;
00095             
00096         case 2: b |= ((uint64_t)in[1])  <<  8;
00097             
00098         case 1: b |= ((uint64_t)in[0]); break;
00099             
00100         case 0: break;
00101     }
00102     
00103 #ifdef DEBUG
00104     printf("(%3d) v0 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v0 >> 32), (uint32_t)v0);
00105     printf("(%3d) v1 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v1 >> 32), (uint32_t)v1);
00106     printf("(%3d) v2 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v2 >> 32), (uint32_t)v2);
00107     printf("(%3d) v3 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v3 >> 32), (uint32_t)v3);
00108     printf("(%3d) padding   %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(b >> 32), (uint32_t)b);
00109 #endif
00110     v3 ^= b;
00111     SIPROUND;
00112     SIPROUND;
00113     v0 ^= b;
00114 #ifdef DEBUG
00115     printf("(%3d) v0 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v0 >> 32), (uint32_t)v0);
00116     printf("(%3d) v1 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v1 >> 32), (uint32_t)v1);
00117     printf("(%3d) v2 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v2 >> 32), (uint32_t)v2);
00118     printf("(%3d) v3 %08x %08x\n", (int)inlen, (uint32_t)(v3 >> 32), (uint32_t)v3);
00119 #endif
00120     v2 ^= 0xff;
00121     SIPROUND;
00122     SIPROUND;
00123     SIPROUND;
00124     SIPROUND;
00125     b = v0 ^ v1 ^ v2  ^ v3;
00126     return b;
00127 }

00129 #ifdef SIPHASHTEST
00130 /*
00131  SipHash-2-4 output with
00132  k = 00 01 02 ...
00133  and
00134  in = (empty string)
00135  in = 00 (1 byte)
00136  in = 00 01 (2 bytes)
00137  in = 00 01 02 (3 bytes)
00138  ...
00139  in = 00 01 02 ... 3e (63 bytes)
00140  */

00209 int
00210 test_vectors()
00211 {
00212 #define MAXLEN 64
00213     uint8_t in[MAXLEN], k[16];
00214     uint64_t out;
00215     int i;
00216     int ok = 1;
00217     
00218     for (i = 0; i < 16; ++i) k[i] = i;
00219     
00220     for (i = 0; i < MAXLEN; ++i) {
00221         in[i] = i;
00222         out = siphash_2_4(in, i, k);
00223         
00224         if (out != U8TO64_LE(vectors[i])) {
00225             printf("test vector failed for %d bytes\n", i);
00226             ok = 0;
00227         }
00228     }
00229     
00230     return ok;
00231 }
00232 int
00233 main()
00234 {
00235     if (test_vectors()) printf("test vectors ok\n");
00236     
00237     return 0;
00238 }
00239 #endif
